in the middle of head between the 4 th and 5 th row on either side making sure that the slight indent that marks the head is where you would like the top of the head to be the stitch marker should tell you where you started the slight indent stuff the body round 41 decrease in the next st single_crochet in the next 2 st x6 18 round 42 decrease in the next st single_crochet in the next st x6 12 round 43 decrease in all 6 stitches 6 fasten_off and sew hole together feet use a 3 5 mm hook make 8 round 1 chain 6 turn round 2 start from the 4 th chain from the hook do 3 single_crochet chain 1 turn round 3 3 single_crochet into the 3 single_crochet you did last round chain 3 turn round 4 3 single_crochet into the 3 single_crochet you did last round chain 1 turn round 5 3 single_crochet into the 3 single_crochet you did last round chain 3 turn round 6 3 slip stitches into the 3 single_crochet you did last round fasten_off leave a long tail for sewing after you have created 8 feet sew two of them together at a time with a whip stitch along the edge this makes them thicker and nicer after sewing them together you should have 4 feet beak use a 4 mm hook make 1 round 1 chain 6 turn 6 round 2 start from second chain from hook
